array.string: identifier "$(BT_APP_NAME)" and anchor apple generic and certificate leaf[subject.CN] = "$(BT_CODE_SIGN_CN)" and certificate 1[field.1.2.840.113635.100.6.2.1] /* exists */
identifier "$(BT_SERVICE_NAME)" and anchor apple generic and certificate leaf[subject.CN] = "$(BT_CODE_SIGN_CN)" and certificate 1[field.1.2.840.113635.100.6.2.1] /* exists */
